name: newaccount.pc.chair
subject: [{{CONFSHORTNAME}}] Welcome to the Program Committee as Track Co-Chair
body:
Dear {{IF(USERTITLE)}}{{USERTITLE}} {{ENDIF}}{{NAME}},

On behalf of the Technical Program Committee, we sincerely appreciate your acceptance to serve as Track Co-Chair for {{CONFNAME}}. Your expertise and leadership will be invaluable in maintaining the high standards of your track. To streamline your preparation and ensure a smooth process, please review the following next steps:

1. Activate your account
- Site: {{LINK}}
- Your Email: {{EMAIL}}
- Set Your Password: Please use the unique link below to create your password.
{{IF(NEEDPASSWORD)}}
{{PASSWORDLINK}}

Should the link expire, you can always use the "Forgot my password" link on the login page to get a new one.
{{ENDIF}}

2. Update Your Profile
Please make sure your affiliation and other personal information are up to date.

3. Prepare for Review Management
Once submissions close, your responsibilities will include:
- Coordinating with your fellow Track Co-Chairs to determine who will handle each submission.
- Assigning reviewers to papers based on expertise and conflict-of-interest checks.
- Moderating discussions to resolve conflicting reviews or ambiguities.
- Recommending final decisions (Accept, Conditional Accept, Reject) to the TPC Co-Chairs for approval.

A detailed guideline for review process will follow closer to the submission deadline.

Thank you once again for your dedication to making {{CONFSHORTNAME}} a great success. Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at {{ADMIN}}.

Best regards,
Wei Gong, Amiya Nayak and Yaxiong Xie
TPC Co-Chairs, {{CONFSHORTNAME}}
